DoLoT: 
 A venture to mold the young minds of high schooling and higher secondary education. Creativity must be enhanced with respect to the age of living, technology evolving and society existing around. Awareness towards higher education, skill oriented-career choice, mind-exploration is vital. 
 Through DoLoT , we, team of professionals from different background (Engineering to Commerce) offer your students an opportunity to reach that “extra” from ordinary to extraordinary! DoLoT Workshop & 
 Training Program: A creative training program designed to equip students with possibilities of modern technology of information gathering and processing. And, enable them in achieving academic performance excellence. Workshop Details: 
 1. Motivation Session 
 2. Introducing Do - Learn – Train (DoLoT) training 
 3. 5 Effective learning techniques 
 4. Demonstration through academic syllabus chapters
